cards.name: Nescience
cards.description:
Reduce the cost of ALL your cards to 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pulse
cards.description:
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, deal 30 (38) damage and apply 2 (3) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.description:
astrologer:Star.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (8) damage. ( astrologer:Solar: Deal 2 additional damage. )

Ethereal.

astrologer:Lunar: Apply 2 (3) Weak.

astrologer:Star.

cards.description:

astrologer:Lunar: Draw 2 (3) cards.

Gain 5 (7) Block.

Deal 9 (12) damage.
astrologer:Solar: Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Read The Stars
cards.description: Gain 5 (7) Block for each astrologer:Star in your hand.

cards.name: Solar Flare
cards.description: Apply 2 (3) astrologer:Starlit and trigger it once.

cards.name: Stardust
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase. Draw a (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Still
cards.description:
Gain 10 (14) Block.
The astrologer:Stellar_Phase cannot change for 2 turns.

cards.name: Cataclysm
cards.description:
When this card is drawn, reduce its cost by 1 for the combat.
Deal 28 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Confirmation
cards.description:
Shuffle an Ominous Star into your draw pile.
Whenever you draw an Ominous Star, deal 8 (13) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cosmic Expanse
cards.description: Whenever you play a astrologer:Star, increment the astrologer:Stellar_Phase.

cards.name: Crystal Ball
cards.description:
Choose an enemy. At the start of each of its turns, if its intent is the same as its current intent, it loses 11 (15) HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Divination
cards.description:
Put a (any) card (number)  (of cards ) from your hand onto the bottom of your draw pile.
Draw 3 cards.

astrologer:Star.
Gain 10 (14) Block.
Exhaust.

astrologer:Star.
Deal 17 (21) damage.
Apply 1 (2) astrologer:Starlit.

cards.name: Glass Star
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Exhaust the next card you play and gain Block equal to 6 (8) times its cost.

cards.name: Glimpse
cards.description: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, gain 3 (5) Block.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage twice.
Stellar 20: If this kills a non-minion enemy, reduce its cost by 1 permanently.

cards.name: Justice
cards.description:
ALL creatures gain 8 (11) Block.
Stellar 11: ALL enemies lose HP equal to double their current Block.

cards.name: Lonely Star
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Neutron Star
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Apply X astrologer:Starlit.
Deal 2 (3) damage for each stack of astrologer:Starlit the enemy has.

cards.name: Novile
cards.description:
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, gain [E] [E] ( [E]).

cards.name: Observe
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile ( + 3).

cards.name: Premeditation
cards.description: Draw the bottom card of your draw pile, then play and Exhaust it.

cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and put 1 card on the bottom of your draw pile.

cards.name: Prismatic
cards.description: The first time you play a astrologer:Star each turn, apply 1 (2) astrologer:Starlit to a random enemy.

cards.name: Quincunx
cards.description:
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, a random enemy loses 4 (6) Strength this turn.

cards.name: Retelling
cards.description:
Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then put that many  (plus 1 ) cards from your discard pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shine
cards.description:
Play a card in your hand twice and Exhaust it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shining Star
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, apply 3 (4) astrologer:Starlit to a random enemy.

cards.name: Shooting Star
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
 (Ethereal.)
Draw a card.
When this card is Exhausted, add a copy of it to your draw pile.

cards.name: Star Of Change
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, Exhaust a card in your hand and add a random  (upgraded ) card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Star Of Regret
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Deal 8 (10) damage.
When this card is Exhausted, deal twice as much damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Star of Courage
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Gain 1 Strength for each card Exhausted.

cards.name: Star of Misfortune
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Strength
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) Strength.
Exhaust.
Stellar 8: Gain 1 (2) Strength for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Sunrise
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Increase the maximum astrologer:Stellar_Phase by 2 (3).
astrologer:Solar: Double this card's effect.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.description:
Stellar 14: Heal HP equal to the number of Stellar cards in your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
If this does not kill the enemy, lose 6 HP.
Stellar 15: Deals additional damage equal to your missing health.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.description:
Enemy loses 4 (6) Strength this turn.
Stellar 4: Enemy loses three times as much Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.description: Stellar 3: ALL enemies lose HP equal to the total amount of damage they intend to deal.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.description: Whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses 6 (8) HP. Stellar 12: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Block for each card played this turn.
Stellar 9: Draw a card from the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 1 less this turn.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Gain 1 (2) Dexterity. At the end of the turn, lose 1 (2) Dexterity.
Stellar 5: Remove all debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Stellar 2: Double the base damage of a card in your hand for the combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.description:
Exchange the costs of two cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.
Stellar 6: The chosen cards will be played twice the next time you play them.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.description:
astrologer:Lunar: Draw cards until your hand is full.
Stellar 18: Gain 3 (4) Block for each card drawn.

cards.name: The Star
cards.description:
astrologer:Star.
Deal damage equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies.
Stellar 17: Deals twice as much damage.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.description:
Deal 20 (24) damage to a random enemy.
Stellar 16: Deal 20 (24) damage to a random enemy 1 additional times.

cards.name: Alignment
cards.description:
Add X  (+ 1 ) copies of the bottom card of your draw pile to your hand. They cost X  (+ 1 ) less this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Astral Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
ALL your cards are astrologer:Stars.

cards.name: Black Hole
cards.description:
Purge all cards in your Exhaust pile.
Deal 5 (7) damage for each Purged card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Matter
cards.description:
(Innate.)
The first time a card is Exhausted each turn that is not a Status or Curse, add a copy of it to your draw pile.

cards.name: Death
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 13 damage.
Stellar 13: Kill the target non-boss enemy.

cards.name: Fate
cards.description:
The next Stellar card played this turn will be active.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Heat Death
cards.description:
Exhaust ALL your astrologer:Stars.
Deal 7 (9) damage to a random enemy for each card Exhausted.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nova
cards.description: Trigger astrologer:Starlit 1 (2) time (times) at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Premonition
cards.description: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, draw a card.

astrologer:Star.
astrologer:Solar: Deal 16 (22) damage to ALL enemies.
Stellar 19: ALL enemies lose 33 (44) HP.

cards.name: The World
cards.description:

Stellar 21: Play all of the cards in your exhaust pile.

cards.name: Trine
cards.description:
Ethereal.
When this card is drawn, the next card you play this turn is played twice.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.description:
Lose 10 Gold.
Stellar 10: Play 2 (3) random Stellar cards. Their Stellar effects are triggered.

cards.name: Wish
cards.description:
Costs 1 less [E] for each astrologer:Star card Exhausted this combat.
Gain 12 (18) Block.
Draw 2 cards.

relics.name: Sky's Mirror
relics.description: Put the first card played each turn onto the bottom of the draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The sky you see is limited; look here, instead.

relics.name: Telescope
relics.description: At the start of combat, increase the Stellar Phase by 4.
relics.flavorText: The lens is cracked, but it's still valuable for the memories.

relics.name: Universal Mirror
relics.description: Put cards played onto the bottom of the draw pile.

keywords.name: Alignment
keywords.description:
The Stellar Alignment can be either Solar or Lunar.
Stellar Alignment switches whenever a Star is played or Exhausted.

keywords.name: Ominous Star
keywords.description: Ominous Star is a 1 cost Star.

keywords.name: Star
keywords.description: When this card is played or Exhausted, increase the Stellar Phase by 1 and change the Alignment.

keywords.name: Starlit
keywords.description: Starlit creatures lose HP equal to the current Stellar Phase at the start of their turn. Each turn, Starlit is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Stellar Phase
keywords.description: The Stellar Phase starts at 1, and increases whenever a Star is played or Exhausted.

mods.name: Astrologer

Astrologer.
